backend/main.mo: Stores contact form submissions in a map and exposes submit, fetch-all, and fetch-by-name methods.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence metadata linking an About page styling update to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment checklist covering pre-deploy, post-deploy, testing, performance, assets, and known issues.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting metadata and mounting the React app root with main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures all application routes using TanStack Router and renders the router provider.
frontend/src/components/blog/ArticleSide: Layout component displaying an article's image and content side-by-side with responsive ordering.
frontend/src/components/common/Container: Wrapper component providing consistent responsive page padding and max-width.
frontend/src/components/common/GradientB: Transparent structural wrapper preserving layout spacing without applying gradients.
Reusable card component with optional icon, title, description, and content slots.
frontend/src/components/common/MotionGra: Empty placeholder file for a removed animated background component.
frontend/src/components/common/OceanAnim: Empty placeholder file for a removed ocean animation background component.
frontend/src/components/common/ProfilePo: Displays a rounded portrait image with gradient glow and multiple size options.
frontend/src/components/common/RightSide: Empty placeholder file for a right-side portrait component.
frontend/src/components/common/SectionCo: Empty placeholder file for a section corner portrait component.
frontend/src/components/common/SectionMe: Empty placeholder file for a medium portrait component.
frontend/src/components/common/ShareSite: Card that displays the site's URL and provides copy-to-clipboard and open-in-new-tab actions.
frontend/src/components/common/StaticWat: Renders the static waterfall background layer and overlay scrim.
frontend/src/components/common/Waterfall: Empty placeholder file for a deprecated video background component.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: A contact form component with validation, input handling, and submission using a custom hook, displaying success or error states.
frontend/src/components/contact/SubmitSt: Displays success or error alerts after contact form submission based on props.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Landing page hero section with name, tagline, description, and call-to-action buttons.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive site header with desktop and mobile navigation, highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with brand info, quick links, contact prompt, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper including background, header, main outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Projec: Category filter using tab controls to switch visible project types.
Grid of project cards showing title, description, tools, and optional external link.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillCate: Displays a skill category card containing multiple skill meters.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillMete: Renders a skill name with a percentage progress bar.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillsDet: Renders detailed skill cards with images, descriptions, and categorized bullet points.
frontend/src/data/blogArticles.ts: Defines the BlogArticle interface and provides an array of detailed blog article objects with metadata and content sections.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Defines the Project interface and exports a list of project entries describing work across legal, business, marketing, design, video, and web categories.
frontend/src/data/skillsDetails.ts: Defines the SkillDetail interface and provides structured skill categories and descriptions for legal, marketing, design, and video domains.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that tracks the user's prefers-reduced-motion system setting via a media query listener.
Provides a mutation hook for submitting contact form data to the backend actor and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining light/dark themes, background images, overlays, and typography overrides.
frontend/src/lib/assetPaths.ts: Utility functions to normalize static asset paths and provide a fallback image path.
frontend/src/lib/emailValidation.ts: Exports a simple email validation function using a regex pattern.
frontend/src/lib/portrait.ts: Exports centralized portrait image path and alt text with URL-encoded asset handling.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Provides a function to set document title and meta tags, including Open Graph tags, using a helper for creating or updating meta elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with biography content, highlight cards, and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogDigitalMarke: Renders the digital marketing article page, loads article data by slug, sets SEO, handles image fallback, and displays content in a side‑by‑side layout.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogGraphicDesig: Renders the graphic design article page with SEO setup, image fallback handling, and a side‑by‑side layout with the image on the right.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogLawLegalArti: Displays the law and legal article using fetched article data, applies SEO settings, manages image loading, and renders sections in a side‑by‑side layout.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogVideoEditing: Shows the video editing article page, configuring SEO, image handling, and structured article content in a left‑image side‑by‑side layout.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogWebDesignDev: Renders the web design and development article page, including SEO setup, image fallback, and a right‑image side‑by‑side content layout.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Displays a grid of blog articles with images, fallback handling, and sets blog page SEO.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form and contact information section and sets Contact page SEO tags.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage hero section and sets full SEO including Open Graph metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Shows filterable project grid and skills details while setting Portfolio page SEO.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists service offerings with icons and descriptions and sets Services page SEO.
frontend/src/pages/SkillsPage.tsx: Displays the skills detail section and sets Skills page SEO metadata.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, extended animations, shadows, and typography, plus plugin setup for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing redesign tasks, theme/background changes, typography updates, contact info updates, and known deployment issues for a multi-page portfolio site.
